ai-ja308:1.3_0: I don’t want to harm you!
ai-ja308:1.4_0: even if you get anything cohab.”
ai-ja308:2.4_0: You can live happily for what you say.”
ai-ja308:3.2_0: if it is not actually done;
ai-ja308:4.2_0: is not the Dhamma of friends.
ai-ja308:4.4_0: taken away from that host of gods.”
ai-ja308:5.1_0: and eighth was the eighth bird.
